product_name: Brooks Infiniti II Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cold weather doesn't have to mean a trip to the treadmill. With lightweight warmth and full-length coverage, the Brooks Infiniti II Tights protect you from chilly weather without letting you overheat. Soft, stretchy polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly; stretch-mesh inserts behind knees enhance breathability. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and irritation; internal waistband drawcord ensures a secure fit. Zippered rear pocket stashes energy gels, ID or media player; waistband features an internal key pocket. Cuffs fold up easily when you want a little extra ventilation. Brooks Infiniti II Tights feature reflective details for increased visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Cold weather doesn't have to mean a trip to the treadmill. With lightweight warmth and full-length coverage, the Brooks Infiniti II Tights protect you from chilly weather without letting you overheat.
